name: Disasteroids (itch) (Rilantes)
description:
Controls:

Use WASD to control the ship and use the cursor to aim. Press space to skip the current song or press "M" to mute the music. Try to beat the high score!

Assets used:

Warped Vehicles by Ansimuz

Animated Pixel Art Planets by Helianthus Games

Patreon's Top Down Collection by Ansimuz

Music by creammamire, Better Kinetic, and Dreamers on the Run.
